high_descs: Turn to the right and stand in front of the bed.
Close the computer and pick the computer up from the bed.
Go left and then turn to the right to face the lamp on the white dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick a computer up and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Move back to the bed where the laptop is
Pick up the black laptop on top of the bed
Carry the laptop over to the white dresser facing the desk lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Carry a laptop while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Walk to the edge of the bed.
Close the computer, and grab it.
Walk to the edge of the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine a computer under a lamp.
